power.Name: Martial Conditioning I
power.Description: Unarmed Strikes deal additional damage, this includes limbs equipped with natural weapons. This scales with your overall level.

power.Name: Chaining Strikes
power.Description: The chances of performing an offhand strike while unarmed or wielding natural weapons is increased by 5% multiplied against your agility modifier. This is further increased by 5% per 4 character levels.

power.Name: Combination Strikes I
power.Description: Dealing consecutive strikes while unarmed or wielding a natural weapon increases your damage in increments of 5% up to 150% per successful hit, this refreshes after leaving combat or missing/failing to penetrate with your attack.

power.Name: Martial Conditioning II
power.Description: Your body is conditioned to take blows and your combat experience allows you to react more strategically to taking a hit, you are 20% more resistant to being stunned and dazed, and harder to knock prone. This resistance scales as you increase in level. You gain +10 to your Quickness permanently.

power.Name: Combination Strikes II
power.Description: Dealing consecutive strikes while unarmed or wielding a natural weapon increases your chance for a critical by 2% up to 30% per successful hit, this refreshes after leaving combat, or missing/failing to penetrate with your attack.

power.Name: Sure-Strikes
power.Description: You can deliver an attack at double penetration so long as you aren't wielding a weapon. If the attack lands, there's scaling chance you will throw another sure-strike or your sure-strikes cooldown will be refreshed.

power.Name: Martial Forms
power.Description: Gain access to special stances that grant their user incredible prowess.

power.Name: Path of the Dawnglider
power.Description: A balanced stance, for those waiting to unleash their inner fire. Dealing successful strikes will add +1 to the 'sure-strike,' command up to a maximum +10. While in this stance you gain a +1 to hit and +1 to DV.

power.Name: Path of The Salt-Back
power.Description: Sacrifice attack power for defensive options, you now have 20% chance to deflect blows, adding your toughness to your AV on a successful block. Successful blocks count towards your Combination Strikes, however you now deal 50% less damage and your mobility is reduced by 10. [Wearing bracers or wristblades increases this chance 10%.]

power.Name: Path of the Salt-Hopper
power.Description: Sudden, high precision strikes that target sensitive areas on the foe; melee damage bonuses switch to your agility modifier instead of strength, though you lose the ability to build your combo-gauge. Your strikes now have a chance of inflicting various status ailments upon your foes. Though you have diminished damage, you deal extra damage to enemies who are already afflicted with status ailments.

power.Name: Path of the Slumberling
power.Description: Vicious sweeping attacks that harm all while throwing away all defensive abilities. At the cost of half your AV and DV, attacks while unarmed now deal damage to nearby foes, for every successful hit on an opponent, enemies flanking you must make a penetration save or be dealt 50% of the damage. There's a 2% (amped by combo-counter) each strike, you might dismember an opponents' limb. On a successful dismemberment, enemies flanking you must make a Willpower saving throw or be given the Fear effect. You deal bonus damage on stunned, prone, dazed and otherwise immobile enemies.

power.Name: Path of the Astral Tabby
power.Description: Evasive, untouchable, no matter how many flank you--you move as the void does. When flanked by multiple enemies, you gain a bonus to your DV per unit surrounding you, successful dodges build your Combination Strike counter and you gain a +10 to movement speed and gain a bonus to evading missiles, you however deliver reduced damage.

power.Name: Combination Strikes III
power.Description: Dealing consecutive strikes while unarmed or wielding a natural weapon increases your Penetration by 1 per successful consecutive hit, this refreshes after leaving combat, or missing/failing to penetrate with your attack.

power.Name: Martial Conditioning III
power.Description: You are at the prime of both your mental and physical conditioning, while meditating you now regain extra HP up to your toughness modifier. You sprint for 40 more turns. You gain a +3 to AV and DV.
